Class RustCompileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rust.RustCompileUtils

  • public class RustCompileUtils
extends Object
    Utilities to generate various kinds of Rust compilation.

      • getCrateRoot

        public static Optional<SourcePath> getCrateRoot(SourcePathResolver resolver,
                                                String crate,
                                                com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> defaults,
                                                java.util.stream.Stream<SourcePath> sources)
        Given a list of sources, return the one which is the root based on the defaults and user parameters.
        Parameters:
        resolver - Source path resolver for rule
        crate - Name of crate
        defaults - Default names for this rule (library, binary, etc)
        sources - List of sources
        Returns:
        The matching source

      • getTransitiveRustSharedLibraries

        public static Map<String,SourcePath> getTransitiveRustSharedLibraries(CxxPlatform cxxPlatform,
                                                                      Iterable<? extends BuildRule> inputs)
                                                               throws NoSuchBuildTargetException
        Collect all the shared libraries generated by RustLinkables found by transitively traversing all unbroken dependency chains of RustLinkable objects found via the passed in BuildRule roots.
        Returns:
        a mapping of library name to the library SourcePath.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBuildTargetException
